description:
A snackbar takes a queue of toasts and displays them to the user one after another.
They can be auto dismissed, or require user interaction to close the toast.

className.description: An optional className to apply to the active toast.

text.name: string
text.description: The text to display in the toast.

key.name: any
key.description: An optional key for the toast.

action.name: union
action.description:
An optional action to take. If this value is a string, a `FlatButton`
will be created with a `label` of this value and the `onClick` function
will be the `dismiss` function. If this is an object, all values will be
applied to the `FlatButton`.

onAppear.name: func
onAppear.description: An optional function to call when the toast appears.

toasts.description:
The moving queue of toasts to display.

##### Shape Description

autohide.description: Boolean if the toast should automatically hide after the given timeout.

dismiss.description: A function to call that will dismiss the active toast.

transitionName.description: The transition name to use for the snackbar.

transitionEnterTimeout.description: The transition enter timeout for the snackbar.

transitionLeaveTimeout.description: The transition leave timeout for the snackbar.

fab.description:
An optional Floating Action Button element that should be moved
when a toast appears/disappears.
